body.name: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 RAM 32GB (2x16GB) 6000MHz CL40 Intel XMP iCUE Compatible Computer Memory - Black (CMH32GX5M2B6000C40)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

features: Dynamic Ten-Zone RGB Lighting: Illuminate your system with ten individually addressable, ultra-bright RGB LEDs per module, encased in a panoramic light bar for vivid RGB lighting from any viewing angle.
Onboard Voltage Regulation: Enables easier, more finely-tuned, and more stable overclocking through CORSAIR iCUE software than previous generation motherboard control.
Custom Intel XMP 3.0 Profiles: Customize and save your own XMP profiles via iCUE to tailor performance by app or task for greater efficiency.
Create and Customize: Choose from dozens of preset lighting profiles, or create your own in iCUE.
Maximum Bandwidth and Tight Response Times: Optimized for peak performance on the latest Intel DDR5 motherboards.
body.description: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 memory delivers DDR5 performance, higher frequencies, and greater capacities optimized for Intel® motherboards while lighting up your PC with dynamic, individually addressable ten-zone RGB lighting. Tightly screened high-frequency memory chips enable faster processing, rendering, and buffering than ever, with onboard voltage regulation for easy, finely controlled overclocking. Take control with CORSAIR iCUE software and enable RGB lighting customization, real-time frequency monitoring, onboard voltage regulation, and Intel XMP 3.0 profile customization. A custom PCB provides superb signal quality for high performance and stability on the latest Intel DDR5 motherboards. For cutting-edge DDR5 performance with mesmerizing RGB lighting, VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 lights the way.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 478 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real Ace of Memory (RAM)
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my PC's memory with the CORSAIR 32GB kit (2x16GB), and it has truly taken my system's performance and aesthetics to a whole new level. This RAM kit combines exceptional speed, reliable performance, and stunning RGB lighting, making it a standout choice for gamers, content creators, and PC enthusiasts.The first thing that caught my attention with the DDR5 RAM is its impressive speed. With DDR5 technology, this kit delivers lightning-fast data transfer rates and responsive multitasking capabilities. It effortlessly handles demanding tasks, including gaming, video editing, and rendering, providing a noticeable boost in performance and productivity.The 32GB capacity (2x16GB) of this kit ensures ample memory for handling resource-intensive applications and multitasking scenarios. It allows for smooth and efficient operation, even when running multiple applications simultaneously. Whether you're engaging in intense gaming sessions or working on complex projects, this RAM kit ensures a seamless and responsive experience.The RGB design is where this RAM truly shines. The sleek and stylish heat spreaders not only enhance the kit's aesthetics but also help dissipate heat effectively, ensuring reliable performance even during extended usage. The RGB lighting offers an impressive array of customizable effects and colors, allowing you to personalize your system's look to match your unique style or create dynamic lighting setups that sync with other RGB components.Installing the RAM is a breeze. The modules are compatible with most modern motherboards and slot effortlessly into place. The inclusion of XMP 2.0 support ensures quick and easy overclocking, allowing you to maximize the performance potential of your RAM with just a few clicks.In terms of reliability, Corsair is renowned for its quality and durability. The Vengeance kit lives up to that reputation, offering stable and reliable performance even under demanding conditions. The kit is backed by Corsair’s excellent customer support, giving you peace of mind knowing that assistance is available if needed.Overall, the kit is a fantastic choice for those seeking a blend of exceptional performance and eye-catching aesthetics. Its speed, capacity, and stunning RGB lighting create an immersive and powerful PC experience. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or simply want a high-performance system, this RAM kit is a worthy investment that will enhance your PC's capabilities and make it the envy of others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The performance is amazing and the Looks are even better
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got 128 GB of this beauty easts and I have no regrets, I love them for what they do and looks, bare in ming, that if you don't have Corsair PC (Like the actual Motherboard and stuff) it might get a little complicated at first to "sync" or even change the color to what you prefer, but once you find the way, It's easy. I'm running an MSI Motherboard, so yes, it is possible to customize color, brightness and effects even.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best looking ram on the market in my opinion. Fast speeds and looks great in my all white build!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top of the line quality and performance
reviews.reviewText: Corsair RAM always works flawlessly, and this selection of RAM is no exception. Snapping the RAM dimms (sticks) into their slots is a breeze, and you don't have to worry about breaking these RAM dimms when pushing them in. Furthermore, the RGB that comes on this ram works seamlessly with Corsair's free iCue software (to be downloaded by user) to create an immersive custom RGB experience, or even just to turn it off when needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These rams are great and look awesome. Easy to control and 6000mhz is more than enough. Sponsor me Crosshair 🤙🏽

reviews.reviewText: I have not over clocked them but they are fast and stable. Good quality and the rgb is smexy lol

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works at XMP perfectly stable and looks nice and was a great price with warehouse deals
reviews.reviewText: Works at advertised XMP speed out of the box looks nice and saved about 20% using warehouse deals. Doesn't want to update firmware, but works fine as is with current firmware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: Eine leistungsstarke Wahl für Gamer und Enthusiasten
reviews.reviewText: Vorteile:Hohe Geschwindigkeit: Mit 6000 MHz ist dieser RAM ideal für Gaming und anspruchsvolle Aufgaben.RGB-Beleuchtung: Die anpassbare RGB-Beleuchtung über Corsairs iCUE-Software verleiht Ihrem Setup Stil.Große Kapazität: 32 GB (2x16 GB) bieten viel Platz für Multitasking.Nachteile:Hohe Latenz: Die CL40-Latenz könnte die Leistung in bestimmten Szenarien beeinträchtigen.Preis: Qualität hat ihren Preis, dieser RAM ist teurer.Zusammengefasst ist der Corsair VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 RAM eine leistungsstarke und stilvolle Wahl für Gamer und Enthusiasten. Beachten Sie jedoch den höheren Preis und die Latenz.🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Klare Kaufempfehlung
